backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides textual summaries for various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles configuring theme variables, dark mode, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Playfair Display font and mounting the React root.
frontend/public/deploy-marker.txt: Marker file noting the deployment date and configuration fix.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the ValentineFlow experience.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page1Splas: Page 1 shows the apology text and a Next button.
Page 2 shows the message, displays a user-uploaded image, and has a Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page3Apolo: Page 3 shows a romantic apology message with an uploaded image and a Next button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page3Forgi: Empty placeholder file for an unused Page 3 forgive variant.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page4Forgi: Page 4 shows the forgiveness prompt with a Yes button and a moving No button.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page4Hug.t: Empty placeholder file for an unused hug page.
frontend/src/components/pages/Page5Final: Final page displaying the loving message and centered hugging GIF.
Wraps page content with enter/exit transition classes based on state.
frontend/src/components/ValentineFlow.ts: Controls the 5-page navigation flow with timed transitions and renders each page component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login flow, and identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, base typography, animations, and custom styles for buttons, text, and image containers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color variables, radius settings, and animation/typography plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related files, enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable plugins, path aliases, build options, dev server proxy, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s requirements, page flow, theme, image rules, and tracked feature implementations.
